title: D3re
paragraph: A small D3 reusable charts library. Basically I'm working to add some missing .chart() functions in the D3 library.

title: JS algorithms
paragraph: Working through Algorithms, 4th edition and Introduction to Algorithms, 3rd edition using Javascript and teaching myself all the CS I don't work on in my day job. I'm thinking of expanding this and recreating the data structures and algorithms in Java and Python as well.

title: OKC coffee
paragraph: An app to explore coffee shops in Oklahoma City. Designed and built from the ground up to be a hub for coffee people of OKC. However, a lot more work needs to be done on this project. I need to finish collecting data for coffee shops, to develop a suggestion system to lead you to the perfect cup in town, and to actually launch the thing. I'll take a couple of weekends and finish this project over a cup of coffee.

title: stats made simple
paragraph: A series of explainers and tutorials for aspiring statisticians. This is another project that has significantly more work to be done. I'll need two cups of coffee.

title: earthquakes in Oklahoma
paragraph: I felt an earthquake during lunch. I decided to put a couple of minutes into a series of maps and charts that touch on the swarm of induced earthquakes in Oklahoma. (Even more.) Each visualization is updated with real-time earthquake data. I will include more data layers as they become available.

title: legislature voting trends
paragraph: Similarity matrix of the 2015 Oklahoma Legislature voting trends. This small project basically answers the question: which legislators vote like each other?
